name: hello-express
description: A simple Node app built on Express, instantly up and running.

scripts.start:dev: cross-env DOMAIN=https://kibopush-sojharo.ngrok.io DEBUG=demossa:* PORT=3000 SECURE_PORT=8443 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
scripts.debug: cross-env DOMAIN=https://kibopush-sojharo.ngrok.io DEBUG=express:router:route,express:application,demossa:* PORT=3000 SECURE_PORT=8443 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
